testsuite.name: com.ultimateqa.testsuite.LoginPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Click on SignInLink[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ac268f746c8f13ecca016a7ce58f9144)] -> xpath: //a[contains(text(),'Sign In')]] Enter emailtesting13@gail.com to email field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ac268f746c8f13ecca016a7ce58f9144)] -> id: user[email]] Enter passwordtest34 to password field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ac268f746c8f13ecca016a7ce58f9144)] -> name: user[password]] Click on Sign In Button[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ac268f746c8f13ecca016a7ce58f9144)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Sign in')]] Get Error Message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ac268f746c8f13ecca016a7ce58f9144)] -> xpath: //li[contains(text(),'Invalid email or password.')]]
